schools.name: Pearl City High School
schools.school-summary: Pearl City High School, a public school located in Pearl City, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Pearl City Community Unit School District 200.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Pearl City Community Unit School District 200
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Pearl City Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Pearl City Elementary School, a public school located in Pearl City, IL, serves grades PK-6 in the Pearl City Community Unit School District 200.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
